rows.label: qst201802_0010
rows.name:
Sorry to keep you waiting!
Everyone's back!

rows.label: qst201802_0020
rows.name:
Hey, if you all gather around
like that, Uka can't move!

rows.label: qst201802_0030
rows.name: They all look so happy.

rows.label: qst201802_0040
rows.name:
Why are the Phonexes
making such a racket, mo?

rows.label: qst201802_0050
rows.name: Who knows?

rows.label: qst201802_0060
rows.name: Um...

rows.label: qst201802_0070
rows.name: What is it, Uka?

rows.label: qst201802_0080
rows.name: Well...

rows.label: qst201802_0090
rows.name:
The Phonexes want me to tell
them the tale of our adventure.

rows.label: qst201802_0100
rows.name: I see... a tale of adventure.

rows.label: qst201802_0110
rows.name:
We've been through a lot.
Let's tell them all about it.

rows.label: qst201802_0120
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: qst201802_0130
rows.name:
So then, we all charged into
the monster's nest, like BAM!

rows.label: qst201802_0140
rows.name:
And then, there was this super
strong-looking one waiting for us...

rows.label: qst201802_0150
rows.name:
But, but, Uka tried to persuade it,
talking to it with all her might.

rows.label: qst201802_0160
rows.name:
Persuade? Weren't ye just
talkin' at it one-sidedly?

rows.label: qst201802_0170
rows.name:
That's right, mo. Uka was talking so confidently,
but in the end, they didn't understand at all, mo.

rows.label: qst201802_0180
rows.name: Th-That's not true!

rows.label: qst201802_0190
rows.name:
It's just that they were short-tempered
and wouldn't listen to me.

rows.label: qst201802_0200
rows.name:
If it were any other monster,
I could have persuaded them.

rows.label: qst201802_0210
rows.name: Are ye sure about that?

rows.label: qst201802_0220
rows.name: Hey! Stop laughing, everyone!

rows.label: qst201802_0230
rows.name:
That monster just headbutted
Uka out of nowhere...

rows.label: qst201802_0240
rows.name:
...and it hurt so much that
tears came to my eyes.

rows.label: qst201802_0250
rows.name: They were just too violent...

rows.label: qst201802_0260
rows.name:
But you hit them back with incredible
force right after, didn't you?

rows.label: qst201802_0270
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: qst201802_0280
rows.name:
Uka's attack was so powerful
that the monster flinched.

rows.label: qst201802_0290
rows.name: Yeah, that was quite a sight.

rows.label: qst201802_0300
rows.name:
W-Well, Uka did get a
little ticked off by that.

rows.label: qst201802_0310
rows.name:
Without listening to Kaku-tan and Suke-tan,
I couldn't help but get serious.

rows.label: qst201802_0320
rows.name: And then, and then?

rows.label: qst201802_0330
rows.name:
After that, we all fought the
violent monster together.

rows.label: qst201802_0340
rows.name: Wham! Bam! We beat them up.

rows.label: qst201802_0350
rows.name: It was a great victory for us.

rows.label: qst201802_0360
rows.name:
And then, we finally
rescued the Phonex heroes.

rows.label: qst201802_0370
rows.name: Huh? What's wrong, mo?

rows.label: qst201802_0380
rows.name:
Are you disappointed that the
ending was so simple, mo?

rows.label: qst201802_0390
rows.name: Um...

rows.label: qst201802_0400
rows.name:
The Phonexes are saying that
Uka is the true hero...

rows.label: qst201802_0410
rows.name: The true hero?

rows.label: qst201802_0420
rows.name:
They're saying I'm a hero for saving my
comrades, the birth of a true hero...

rows.label: qst201802_0430
rows.name: ...What should I do?

rows.label: qst201802_0440
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Ahahahaha!

rows.label: qst201802_0450
rows.name: The true hero, eh? Sounds cool.

rows.label: qst201802_0460
rows.name:
Uka didn't do anything that great,
so being called a true hero...

rows.label: qst201802_0470
rows.name: That's not so.

rows.label: qst201802_0480
rows.name:
Uka worked hard to save the
many little lives here.

rows.label: qst201802_0490
rows.name: Yes, that's right.

rows.label: qst201802_0500
rows.name:
Uka brilliantly solved a major incident
that we wouldn't have even noticed.

rows.label: qst201802_0510
rows.name: You're a fine hero.

rows.label: qst201802_0520
rows.name: Uka... a hero...

rows.label: qst201802_0530
rows.name:
Ehehe... It's a bit
embarrassing, but I'm happy.

rows.label: qst201802_0540
rows.name:
You couldn't talk to the monsters, but it's
good that the Phonexes acknowledged you.

rows.label: qst201802_0550
rows.name: ...Yes.
